COMM_PREF_ADDL_ITEMS.name: COMM_PREF_ADDL_ITEMS
COMM_PREF_ADDL_ITEMS.description: This table contains items related to Patient Communication Preferences.

columns.name: PREFERENCES_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier (.1 item) for the subject name record.

columns.name: APPT_NOTIF_SCHEDULED_YN
columns.description: This item stores a Yes No category value indicating whether the patient accepts Cadence Scheduled Appointment Notifications.

columns.name: APPT_NOTIF_CHANGED_YN
columns.description: This item stores a Yes No category value indicating whether the patient accepts Cadence Changed Appointment Notifications.

columns.name: APPT_NOTIF_CANCELED_YN
columns.description: This item stores a Yes No category value indicating whether the patient accepts Cadence Cancelled Appointment Notifications.

columns.name: APPT_NOTIF_MISSED_YN
columns.description: This item stores a Yes No category value indicating whether or not a patient accepts Cadence Missed Appointment Notifications.
